_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CEDSOVR_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, NAME_OVR VARCHAR(254), SHORTDESC_OVR VARCHAR(254), KEYWORD_OVR VARCHAR(254), PUBLISHED_OVR VARCHAR(254), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CEDSOVR_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT R.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID, RTRIM(R.NAME) NAME, R.SHORTDESCRIPTION SHORTDESCRIPTION, R.KEYWORD KEYWORD, rtrim(cast(R.CATOVRGRP_ID as char(23))) ||'_'|| rtrim(cast(R.PUBLISHED as char(23))) PUBLISHED_FLAG FROM CATENTDESCOVR R, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# C WHERE R.CATENTRY_ID = C.CATENTRY_ID and R.LANGUAGE_ID = ?language_id? ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID
